publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current voltage of the battery, as reported by VEXos.
publicFunctions.details: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: EACCES - Another resource is currently trying to access the battery port.
publicFunctions.name: get_capacity
returns: The current voltage of the battery
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current voltage of the battery, as reported by VEXos.
publicFunctions.title: get_capacity

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current current of the battery in milliamps, as reported by VEXos.
publicFunctions.details: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: EACCES - Another resource is currently trying to access the battery port.
publicFunctions.name: get_current
returns: The current current of the battery
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current current of the battery in milliamps, as reported by VEXos.
publicFunctions.title: get_current

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current temperature of the battery, as reported by VEXos.
publicFunctions.details: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: EACCES - Another resource is currently trying to access the battery port.
publicFunctions.name: get_temperature
returns: The current temperature of the battery
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current temperature of the battery, as reported by VEXos.
publicFunctions.title: get_temperature

publicFunctions.brief: Gets the current capacity of the battery in millivolts, as reported by VEXos.
publicFunctions.details: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: EACCES - Another resource is currently trying to access the battery port.
publicFunctions.name: get_voltage
returns: The current capacity of the battery
publicFunctions.summary: Gets the current capacity of the battery in millivolts, as reported by VEXos.
publicFunctions.title: get_voltage
